Interactive Dashboard

Wolfgang Seis

Source: vignettes/dashboard.Rmd
dashboard.Rmd

Install R package r2q 

### Optionally: specify GitHub Personal Access Token (GITHUB_PAT)
### See here why this might be important for you:
### https://kwb-r.github.io/kwb.pkgbuild/articles/install.html#set-your-github_pat

# Sys.setenv(GITHUB_PAT = "mysecret_access_token")

# Install package "remotes" from CRAN
if (! require("remotes")) {
  install.packages("remotes", repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org")
}

# Install KWB package 'r2q' from GitHub
remotes::install_github("KWB-R/r2q")

Run dashboard locally 

rmarkdown::run(file = system.file("dashboard/flexdashboard.Rmd", 
                                   package = "r2q"))

Developed by Wolfgang Seis, Andreas Matzinger, R2Q.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.3.
